description:
Make chromium_builder_tests depend on all_blink

This is necessary so chromium buildbots and tryservers can run blink's unit
tests.

BUG=248008
R=thakis@chromium.org

Committed: https://src.chromium.org/viewvc/chrome?view=rev&revision=205242

messages.text:
lgtm

Please watch http://build.chromium.org/p/tryserver.chromium/stats after this lands and see if compile time goes up considerably

CQ is trying da patch. Follow status at
https://chromium-status.appspot.com/cq/jamesr@chromium.org/16299005/1

On 2013/06/10 17:33:11, Nico wrote:
> lgtm
> 
> Please watch http://build.chromium.org/p/tryserver.chromium/stats after this
> lands and see if compile time goes up considerably

I think that's unlikely since many of the test targets depend on the blink library transitively, so the only delta will be the unit tests themselves (few dozen files).
Committed patchset #1 manually as r205242 (presubmit successful).

subject: Make chromium_builder_tests depend on all_blink
